CustomField.description: As admin, after creating a new portal, save the Manda URL in here, so you have it handy when you need it. https://manda.propertybase.com/feed/00Db_YOUR_18DIGIT_ORG_ID_0CCCCCC/propertyfinder/a0hb_18_Digit_Portal_Record_ID_0BBBBBBBB How to build a feed URL: https://help.propertybase.com/hc/en-us/articles/202899016-Middle-East-Property-Portal-Integration
CustomField.inlineHelpText: XML Feed URL value depends on the Generator field.
CustomField.label: XML Feed URL
